website_summaries.verdict: While atypically-sized keys may take a little getting used to, this is a good and affordable option for those prone to spills, as well as those who need a really clean keyboard for health reasons.
pros: Easy to get up and running
Adjustable foot-stands so you can set it to your height level
cons: Some had issues with the action of this keyboard (too mushy), while some touch typists were turned off by the sizing of some of the keys (backspace key is too small, return key is too large)

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to teenager food-and-drink abuse!
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard for the price. My teenager is rough on keyboards, as he likes to nosh while gaming...so Mountain Dew and junk food have been the downfall of a couple of keyboards at my house. Washable keyboards such as this one is what I've been needing all along :-) And this one does the trick quite nicely...feels and acts like a regular keyboard PLUS the convenience of being able to take a rinse-off and head back into service. Would definitely buy again...but here's hoping I don't have to for a while :-)
customer_reviews.author: dstyes

customer_reviews.title: didn't last
customer_reviews.text: got this for the washable quality. it seems like any other inexpensive membrane keyboard. this was used by somebody who mostly uses a mouse and does not type much at all, and for no reason, after a few months, several of the keys just stopped working. ended up being basically a waste of money. not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: Barely pass
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2 star because some of the keys have to be hit pretty hard to work. I had it on my computer for a few days but couldn't stand typing on it because of missed letters (excessive pressure is required on some keys). It will work for our water jet because we hit keys harder out in the shop so I will keep it because we HAVE to have a water-proof keyboard in that environment.
customer_reviews.author: D K

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So far the wife hasn't ruined this one with her dripping wine glass. Nice! EDIT: I have seen every thing dropped on this thing, salsa, water, wine, mustard...no worries. Once and a while, we just rinse it off with the sink hose, and let it dry...good to go.
customer_reviews.author: HRM

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just what I needed for my full body tub soaks, I ruined a couple regular keyboards from water dripping from my fingers from the tub water. This keyboard works like a champ, wet fingers and all! Good layout, comfortable to type on, good price...
customer_reviews.author: JSJ

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, like the thinness of it and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard, like the thinness of it and it is a very quiet keyboard. Haven't tried the washable function yet. If I ever spill coffee on this I'll let you know how it goes. Only bad thing is that the backspace button is smaller than on other computers but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: VeronicaQ

customer_reviews.title: I Rocks Washable Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Works great in a wet environment. We are using this on a computer next to our plasma cutter and it gets splashed with water quite often. Just wipe it off when it gets wet with no adverse effects.
customer_reviews.author: TomTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Given as a gift to a friend. She reports ...
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to a friend. She reports that it works quite well for what she uses it for, mainly email and internet surfing. I got it for her as her prior keyboard had been spilled on so hoping this will be able to withstand a bit of tea
customer_reviews.author: Barb B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good keyboard. Haven't washed as yet but have put ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good keyboard. Haven't washed as yet but have put an eyeball on it and it looks like it would be no problem to wash and clean with a compressed air can. Much better design than I had. The smaller backspace key does not bother me at all as I am a two fingered whiz and have to look at the keys anyway. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H Richardson

customer_reviews.title: but thus far I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: The backspace key is one key wide, as opposed to my old Kensington where it was two keys wide, but crumbs just fall right out the bottom, and it holds up to heavy typing (I learned on a typewriter, so I'm really hard on my keyboards). I've yet to splash anything major onto it, so the jury's still out on how it holds up to being washed, but thus far I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: M.F.

customer_reviews.title: Failed the first time I washed it
customer_reviews.text: Like the headline says. Washed it once, just a gentle rinse and let it dry. It no longer functions. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: nerdburg

customer_reviews.title: Great for People that are Accident Prone
customer_reviews.text: My brother went through 3 to 4 keyboards a year from spilling various drinks so I decided for his birthday to try a basic washable keyboard and even after half a dozen spills this keyboard still works very well. Note: you will need to run water through the keyboard after a spill to avoid sticky keys. Overall very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. Just be sure not the fully submerge in water!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality seems to be good
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard is working really well and seams to be well made. Haven't had to wash it yet, but believe it won't be problem when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Vern S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product did not live up to expectations, first time I tried to wash it, it no longer worked, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Work well for a year, water proof failed
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a year, water spilled out on the keyboard and caused no problem. Wiped the keyboard with some soak paper today, some keys wont work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof is good
customer_reviews.text: Good to replace my old keyboard that screwed up when I splled anything on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine - haven't needed to wash it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Shorter Backspace button
customer_reviews.text: Working well so far. Backspace button is shorter than what I'm used to
customer_reviews.author: Lorene D.

customer_reviews.title: I should have noticed before I bought it that the ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have noticed before I bought it that the backspace key is the same size as the standard keys but the Enter key is twice the size I am familiar with. Hard to type with this odd arrangement. I am constantly hitting \\\ when I aim for the backspace.
customer_reviews.author: Endigrow

product_meta.title: I-Rocks Washable Keyboard, Black (IRK32W-BK)
product_meta.description: I-Rocks IRK32W is hand-washable keyboard. The engraved letters on the keycaps can survive long-term use without fading away easily. The keyboard is designed with drainage holes, which makes it easy to clean and dry. Don't be afraid if the keyboard gets dirty or you spill your the coffee on it by accident; feel free to shower the keyboard!
feature_bullets: Slim design ideal for Windows-based PC's
Hand-washable, easy to clean and dry
Brush is provided for cleaning the keyboard
Plug and Play, no drivers required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars45 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
